text: John Nugent-Hayward, real name Harold Newton, was an Australian actor with extensive experience in films and radio. He was born and raised in England before moving to Australia. He became one of the best known radio actors in the country. ==Select film credits== *South West Pacific (1943) *The Overlanders (1946) ==References== ==External links== * *Select Australian theatre credits at AusStage Category:Australian male radio actors Category:20th-century Australian male actors Category:Place of birth missing Category:Year of birth missing
title: John Nugent-Hayward
